titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable C.W. Bill Young, a Representative from the State of Florida.
Expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable C.W. Bill Young, a Representative from the State of Florida.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Declares that the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable C.W. Bill Young, a Representative from Florida.
Declares that when the House adjourns on October 22, 2013, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of the deceased Representative.
